channel.title: DDS HITTING help please!

item.title: DDS HITTING help please!
item.dc:creator: @kyled123 kyled123
item.description:
@kyled123 wrote:

hey my dds, i barily hit 20 + with it, and it alway hits 0 on the second hit(double hit)

this is my dds special

if(IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698)
{
setAnimation(0x426);
actionTimer = 4;
SpecDamgNPC(40);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(40);
SpecialDelay -= 3;
} else
if(IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698)
{
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
SpecDamg(40);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
startAnimation(0x426);
actionTimer = 4;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecialDelay -= 3;
} else

PLEASE MAKE IT HIT ATLEASE 40/40, [br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 19, 2008, 05:32:12 PM[/size][hr]cmon help!?
